title: I Dont Think This Is Fair
body: I wasn't toxic at all, why was I banned, the kayn autolocked when I already locked in for jg and I tried to cooperate with him

replies.body:
yeah tbh riot is not great at the whole reasonable thing. Its 100% fine for people to troll as much as they like so long as they write next to nothing and don't run into towers. So keep that in mind when others are being toxic.
Remember so long as you play the game your fine, even if you play as your own separate team

I went ahead and took a peak at those chat logs, and I think I noticed what it was exactly that warranted this. Telling your teammates to kys isn't quite the best display of teamwork or good sportsmanship, and some things can make you [**skip levels of punishment**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286#h1q4).
First time being toxic in game and i skip 2 of the penalties, seems about right. Am i allowes to play on another account for the time being?
